name: zipcaptions
description: zip-captions is a self-hosted utility that collects and packages subtitle or caption files into zip archives for distribution or backup, often used alongside media automation workflows.

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Package collected subtitles into zip files for easy distribution and backup

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Upload and manage subtitle files through a browser-based interface without command-line tools

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Connect with media automation workflows to archive subtitles alongside video downloads

features.title: Language Filtering
features.description: Select specific subtitle languages to include or exclude from archive creation
